alert.note: Alert for San Agustin Plains and Adjacent Lowlands; Southwest Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 5:30PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT WESTERN SOCORRO AND EAST CENTRAL CATRON COUNTIES THROUGH 600 PM MDT... At 530 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles north of Poverty Creek, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Dusty. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building. Accumulations of small hail on roads can create very slick and hazardous driving conditions.

area.areaDesc: San Agustin Plains and Adjacent Lowlands; Southwest Mountains
